title: Simulation Teaching Method Design Based on Nordic Journalism Education Literature Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Basic instructional design theories and mathematics curriculum experience
context.additional_context: A process emphasizing the development of practical pedagogical methods based on literature analysis, featuring small-group activities in VR-based educational simulation environments.

learning_goals: Analyze literature selection criteria from Nordic journalism education programs and replicate them using mathematical modeling.
Propose optimal resource allocation strategies for literature-based instructional design in simulation environments.
Measure the academic and practical suitability of project deliverables using VR-based assessment tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
